meaningMnemonic: You give your <kanji>congratulations</kanji> to someone a few times because they seem so <vocabulary>fresh</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>vibrant</vocabulary>. You feel like you should because it must be nice to be like that still. Someday it will be gone, so make sure you say it a few times right away.
readingMnemonic: The reading is just the kun'yomi reading (which you learned with the kanji) twice in a row.
